name: RuneFinder
description:
TLDR:

Here is a free demo level of my game, PC only.  I’m currently looking for an artist to help complete the project.  If you’re interested in collaborating, please contact me at runefindergamedev@gmail.com. Also, I’m aware of an issue that the game crashes every time you reach the win screen.  Please be aware that you will probably have to force it to close

Overview:

I’m creating an Enter the Gungeon inspired top down shooter and am looking for an artist to help me make the game look like... well... a game instead of just a bunch of developer assets.  I need someone who is a jack of all traits and has some experience with tile-based environment art, character art, ui design, and sprite animation. Basically, I’m looking for someone to partner up with fulltime to finish this title.

Disclaimer:

This is just a non-commercial prototype build and ALL assets and sound effects will be replaced. So will the boss.

Controls:

Move: WASD keys

Mouse: Aim

Left-click: Shoot

Scroll-wheel: Switch weapons (if you have them)

E: Interact

R: Reload

Q: Heal (if you have the resources)

Space: Use active ability

Right-click: Throw explosives (if you have them)

C: Open map - you can click on doors and chests in the map to teleport to them

Tab: Opens up inventory - click and drag to equip (Items autoequip if possible)

Roadmap:

-Hub world and meta game progression system between runs (Completed)

-Procedurally generated levels

-Challenge and puzzle rooms

-Rune damage scaling

-Add more runes and relics

-Enemy variety

-Bosses

-Fully fledged story and questing system
